#summary source src attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

== Usage ==

The source src attribute gives the address of the media resource.

[SourceTypeAttribute examples]

== Values ==

The source src attribute must be a valid URL.

== Elements ==

You can use the `src` attribute on the following elements:

  * [SourceElement <source>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||

== Further reading ==

  * [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/video.html#the-source-element The source src attribute in HTML 5]
